title: Friend of mine not receiving their icon yet
body: I'm just writing this post on the forums hoping a Rioter may see this. A friend of mine had not received the most recent poro icon despite meeting the requirements for them and she has sent a ticket to Riot with the problem. She got a response saying she should of received it the 23rd but still has not even though she tried to contact them again. I also tried to send one for her. It's her favorite icon and I just wanna make any chance I can to get her the icon since she really wants it. Thanks to anyone that replies.

replies.body: We've pushed the deadline to the 30th, as we're still in the process of getting these out. Let me know if you have any questions.
